summary: Completed testing of Gallery is_public feature and Public Project Page Gallery/Search/Sort. All requested features are working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/projects/{id}/gallery/folders accepts is_public field (default false)
Backend: POST /api/projects/{id}/gallery/folders creates folder with is_public=true
Backend: PUT /api/projects/{id}/gallery/folders/{id} updates is_public field
Backend: GET /api/projects/{id}/gallery returns is_public field for folders
Backend: GET /api/public/projects/{id}/gallery endpoint exists and returns 200
Backend: GET /api/public/projects/{id}/gallery returns only public folders
Backend: GET /api/public/projects/{id}/gallery supports search parameter
Backend: GET /api/public/projects/{id}/gallery supports sort_by and sort_order parameters
Backend: GET /api/public/projects/{id}/blog supports search parameter
Backend: GET /api/public/projects/{id}/blog supports sort_by and sort_order parameters
Backend: GET /api/public/projects/{id}/library supports search parameter
Backend: GET /api/public/projects/{id}/library supports sort_by and sort_order parameters
Frontend: Gallery page has 'New Folder' button with data-testid='create-folder-btn'
Frontend: Gallery folder creation dialog has 'Make Public' toggle with Globe icon
Frontend: Gallery folder creation dialog has 'folder-public-switch' data-testid
Frontend: Gallery folder creation dialog shows description 'Public folders are visible on your public project page'
Frontend: Gallery folders display public badge (Globe icon) when is_public is true
Frontend: Public project page has 3 tabs: Blog, Library, Gallery
Frontend: Public project page Gallery tab shows public folders with 'Public' badge
Frontend: Public project page Gallery tab has search input ('Search gallery...')
Frontend: Public project page Gallery tab has sort dropdown ('Newest First')
Frontend: Public project page Blog tab has search input ('Search blog posts...')
Frontend: Public project page Blog tab has sort dropdown ('Newest First')
Frontend: Public project page Library tab has search input ('Search library entries...')
Frontend: Public project page Library tab has sort dropdown ('Newest First')
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up TEST_Public_Folder_UI for testing public badge display
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features are working: 1) Gallery folder creation includes is_public toggle with Globe icon and description, 2) Gallery folders display public badge (Globe icon) when is_public is true, 3) Public project page has Gallery tab showing public folders with 'Public' badge, 4) Public project page Blog/Library/Gallery tabs all have search input and sort dropdown, 5) GET /api/public/projects/{id}/gallery returns only public folders and supports search/sort parameters.
